title: Circular motion - period of connected gears

content.question: Three wheels are arranged as shown in the diagram. Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> has radius <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> and period <math alttext="T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>. Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has radius <math alttext="the fraction 2 R over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>, and Wheel <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> has a radius <math alttext="the fraction R over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>R</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>. The wheels turn each other without slipping. Which of the following correctly relates the period <math alttext="T sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> of Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> to the period <math alttext="T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math> of Wheel <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="T sub A, equals, three eighths times T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="T sub A, equals, two thirds times T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="T sub A, equals T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="T sub A, equals, eight thirds times T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="T sub A, equals, eight thirds times T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
